name: Unnamed Game Demo
description:
IMPORTANT: There are versions for both Windows and Mac. For Windows, just unzip the folder and run Game.exe. I don't know anything about Macs, though lol. If you want a version for Linux, I can do that, too. Just let me know.

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move, Z/Enter/Spacebar to confirm, X/Backspace to cancel or pause, Shift to run. The game can also be fully controlled via a mouse or gamepad. Just plug in a USB controller, and it should work fine.

A JRPG I'm working on. Very early demo of a very early build. Please leave feedback. If you find any glitches, or if you have any ideas for how the game could be improved, leave a comment!

The king's advisor doesn't have a name yet, so his name appears in the game as 'NAME.' I'm open to suggestions, so feel free to leave a comment with what you think he should be called.

Thanks for playing!
